entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mildred Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 33. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
